Hive driver configuration

The configuration parameters and their default values
No. Property Name Default Value Description
1 grill.hive.connection.class com.inmobi.grill.driver.hive.EmbeddedThriftConnection The connection class from HiveDriver to HiveServer. The default is an embedded connection which does not require a remote hive server. For connecting to a hiveserver end point, remote connection should be used. The possible values are com.inmobi.grill.driver.hive.EmbeddedThriftConnection and com.inmobi.grill.driver.hive.RemoteThriftConnection.
2 grill.hs2.connection.expiry.delay 600000 The idle time (in milliseconds) for expiring a hivedriver connection
3 hive.server.read.socket.timeout 10 Socket timeout for the client connection
4 hive.server.tcp.keepalive true TCP Keep alive socket option for HiveServer connection
5 hive.server2.thrift.bind.host The host on which hive server is running
6 hive.server2.thrift.client.connect.retry.limit 1 Number of times to retry a connection to a Thrift hive server
7 hive.server2.thrift.client.password anonymous The client user's password
8 hive.server2.thrift.client.retry.delay.seconds 1 Number of seconds the client should wait between connection attempts.
9 hive.server2.thrift.client.retry.limit 1 Number of times to retry a Thrift service call upon failure
10 hive.server2.thrift.client.user anonymous The client user name
11 hive.server2.thrift.port 10000 The port on which hive server is running
